text:
@realDonaldTrump Hey Donnie Douchebag,
You like numbers. Here are some:
20 MILLION still out of work.
109,143 COVID-19 deaths
Many more protesters going to White House this weekend than people at your inauguration.
Almost 20,000 LIES wrote or spoken in 3.5 yrs.
45th rated president
#DumpTrump
